txt.text:
Hi,
my name is Florian Mrugalla and I am making beats and designing sound since I was a child. VST is a technology and trademark owned by Steinberg. But it's actually much more than that. VST plugins enable us to come together and engage in passionate discourse about art. I am very grateful for the opportunity to be part of this.
That is why I consider VST a lifestyle!
I always wanted to make my own VST plugins and here I am! Let's go on a journey together with my creations now.
:)
